versions.release_notes:
UPI is now live on Trupay !

- Scan & Pay Facility
- More stable experience, taking much less phone memory
- Optimized function, better experience
- Support Android 7.0
- Fixed some bugs


Suggestions? feedback@trupay.me

store_info.title: UPI Money Transfer from Banks
store_info.description:
With Trupay (UPI enabled app), you can pay/send money to anyone anytime directly through your bank account. It's a hassle free, secure and seamless payment option. You can also pay for utilities i.e. recharge your mobile, DTH etc. as well as can pay your postpaid bills for mobile, landline, gas and electricity via Trupay.

Send and request payments in real time using UPI (Unified Payment Interface).Now everyone can create payment id / Virtual Id / Bank Id on Trupay.


Here are the key features:-

Fabulously Friendly: One touch pay on the go. No tardy/cumbersome top-ups in e-wallets. No carrying debit and credit cards. Pay directly from your bank account.

Solidly Secure:- Trupay uses bank grade security systems and data encryption. Ensuring all transactions are fully secure with 2 Factor Authentication, 256-bit-end-to-end-encryption and SSL Certification.

Lightning Fast:- Make bank transfers instantly! In seconds to be precise.

Amazingly Affordable:- It's free! You donâ€™t have to pay anything to make payments. No intermediaries means lowest transaction cost for our merchants. Our merchants can now offer you the best prices possible.

Transact up to 1 Lakh per transaction (24*7). Also on Saturday & Sunday. No bank holidays with us.

We are among the India's first UPI enabled app to facilitate seamless payments to all banks from all banks ( At present live with 24 Banks). Trupay is powered by Yes Bank.

Some of the banks on Trupay are : Andhra bank, Axis bank, Bank of Maharashtra, Bharatiya Mahila bank, Canara bank, Catholic Syrian bank, DCB Bank Ltd, Federal bank, HDFC BANK LTD, ICICI bank, IDBI Bank Limited, IDFC Bank, Karnataka Bank, Kotak Mahindra Bank, Oriental bank of commerce, Punjab national bank, RBL, South Indian Bank, TJSB, UCO Bank, Union bank of India, United Bank of India, Vijaya bank, Yes bank Ltd.

Everyone can create Payment ID/ Virtual ID/ UPI ID/ Virtual Payment ID etc. through Trupay.

Trupay also provides both modes of IMPS:-

1) IMPS Merchant payment based on Merchant mobile number and MMID or initiated from Merchant website (Pay via IMPS).
2) IMPS by adding beneficiary account number and filling IFSC code.

Trupay enables Intrabank and Interbank Funds Transfer (Mobile to Mobile, Mobile to Account) through Unified payments interface (UPI).

SUPPORT:-

We are dedicated to offering the best possible experience to our users. If you run into any issues or have any suggestions, please reach out to us via the following channels:

Mail us on:- support@trupay.in

Website - www.trupay.in

Experience the True way to pay with Trupay!

Happy payments guaranteed!


Connect with us.

Youtube - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCPJABn-jLba9-FPWzAuLjEg

Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/trupayindia/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/Trupayindia

Linked in - https://www.linkedin.com/company/trupay
store_info.short_description: Pay directly from your bank a/c through UPI enabled app. Securely and Instantly!
